summary: Flutter Developer. A passionate and self-taught mobile application developer with solid experience in developing cross-platform applications using Flutter. Proficient in designing and building interactive user interfaces (UI), managing cloud services with Firebase, and integrating RESTful APIs. I am dedicated to continuously enhancing my skills and consistently delivering exceptional results in every project.

experience.title: Tourism-Management-System
description: Unigo is an app that helps users discover the world and book hotels, planes, and trips easily
Personalized trip recommendations based on user preferences
Customizable itineraries with options for flights, hotels, and activities
Seamless booking process with instant confirmation
Loyalty program with rewards and exclusive offers

experience.title: Built a Flutter-based note-taking app
description: Built a Flutter-based note-taking app that allows users to create, edit, and view their notes
Utilized Hive's lightweight and efficient database to store and retrieve user data ensuring fast performance and a smooth user experience
